Package ga

Interface Summary
Crossover Top level interface for defining Crossover GA operators.
Selection The top level interface that defines Selection operators.
Symbiosis The top level interface that defines a Symbiosis operator.
 

Class Summary
Chromosome A Chromosome acted upon by the GA, an Agent contains a LinkedList of these ojects as its "genome".
Gene The abstract Gene defenition, defines what a Gene must be able to do.
GeneFactory An abstract factory for getting hold of implementing Gene objects.
GeneticAlgorithm The top level GA class, used by other interested classes to interact with the GA.
GeneticAlgorithmFactory An abstract factory class for obtaining information about what GA operators are available on the system.
